title: Insider
author: Molina
content: The story of a trainee lawyer Kim Yo-han, who, while working undercover, ends up in prison, where he will have to survive at all costs. The protagonist is calculating and always thinks a few steps ahead. Having found himself in a dangerous situation, having become involved in an unexpected incident during the investigation, he continues to fight for his life.

title: Manner Of Death
author: Molina
content: For me one of the best bl dramas, where the plot is so good as the main characters play.

title: Alchemy of Souls
author: Molina
content: This is one of the best fantasy kdramas I watched do far, And I watched a lot.

title: Queen of Tears
author: Molina
content:
Well, it wasn't something incredible, I know moe interesting dramas, but it wasn't bad either.
Will not watch again, but recommend to watch.
